item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
Behold the terror of the cosmic horror Marit Lage, destined to be undone by Reflector Mages and Man-o-Wars

Quoted TheVorthosCast's tweet:

It’s finally Marit Lage, who is as free as our free #MTGMH1 preview card from @wizards_magic. Artist @VargasNi captures the moment when she breaks out of her icy prison. #MTG #Vorthos

Listen to our preview episode to learn all about this cosmic horror!

https://soundcloud.com/user-345643028/modern-horizons-preview-its-finally-marit-lage
